name: Amish Meatloaf
author: DUANO
summary: A recipe for Amish meatloaf topped with bacon strips and a ketchup glaze that I had while in Amish country in Holmes County, Ohio.
ingredients: ¾ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, mix together ground beef, crushed crackers, onion, eggs, 3/4 cup ketchup, and 1/4 cup brown sugar until well blended
Press into a 9x5 inch loaf pan
Lay the two slices of bacon over the top
Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, or until cooked through
While the loaf bakes, mix together the remaining 1 cup ketchup, vinegar, salt, mustard and 1/2 cup brown sugar
Spread over the top of the meat loaf for the last 15 minutes of baking
